text: Santa Maria Val Müstair () is a village in the Val Müstair municipality of the district of Inn in the Swiss canton of Graubünden. In 2009, Santa Maria Val Müstair merged with Lü, Müstair, Fuldera, Tschierv and Valchava to form the municipality of Val Müstair. Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden Category:Villages in Graubünden
title: Santa Maria Val Müstair
